briefTitle: Distress Reduction by Activity Tracking and Activity Enhancement by Mobile Support Group in Oncology
officialTitle: Distress Reduction by Activity Tracking and Activity Enhancement by Mobile Support Group in Oncology
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Rate of moderate to severe distress at 6 months
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Stage 0-III breast cancer
* ECOG Performance Status 0
* Patient who underwent surgery for breast cancer
* Patients with their own smartphones and who can use smartphone apps

Exclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer recurrence or metastasis
* Severe medical illness
* need to Adjubant Chemotherapy
